amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding in the bill for military bands by $188 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in the Congressional Record to decrease various accounts by 187,770,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 250 (Roll no. 472).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 250 (Roll no. 472).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. McCollum.
